title: How to Grow Vegetables All Year: Plant Covers for Cold Weather Gardening
itunes:title: How to Grow Vegetables All Year: Plant Covers for Cold Weather Gardening
description: How to have vegetables growing all year long (or as close as possible), including which plants will still grow during frosts and hard freezes, which ones can be left in the ground, and for those more tender veggies, how to use plant covers to extend the growing season. For links to resources and the plant covers Melissa uses go to https://melissaknorris.com/213 and for the guide to raising your own fruits and vegetables pre-order and get over $96 in bonuses the Family Garden Plan at http://familygardenplan.com
